name: 19th Indonesian Scholars International Convention (ISIC 19th)
content: The conference is the core event of the ISIC 2019 event, which will be held this year at the University of Nottingham, United Kingdom. Theme: "Embracing Indonesia Resilience 2045: A triple-helix approach of economics, social and infrastructure developments from the Indonesia-UK perspective" Prospective participants can submit research papers to be presented at this event and published in IJASET (Scopus Q2) and KJSS (Scopus Q3). The research topics include but are not limited to 1\. Big data and communication technology 2\. Public transportation system 3\. Promoting sustainable living 4\. Science and Engineering 5\. Science communication and policy 6\. Education system and culture 7\. Corruption 8\. poverty and inequality 9\. National healthcare system 10\. Social management impacts on natural disasters 11\. Promoting creative economy Paper deadline: April 14, 2019 More information, please see website http://isic2019.ppiuk.org/
